title: Bought Master Elemental Lux to Support Riot
body:
So amidst all of the threats and requests to fire people, I decided to buy the Master Edition of Elemental Lux to show my support for Riot and their efforts to correct sexism at their company.

I am Mastery level 1 Lux, and I only played her because she was selected in 1 for All and I was outvoted.  So, not a Lux player at all.  

Anyway, thank you Riot!  Some of us appreciate you!
